exploreJoystream.title: Explore Joystream Now
exploreJoystream.subtitle: Two fast evolving apps for consuming content and governance activities.

atlas.text: Atlas is the flagship content consumer and publishing app for Joystream. Watch videos, follow creators and discover new featured content, or create a channel and build your audience.

pioneer.text: Pioneer is the place to participate in community governance and operation. Vote on elections, submit proposals to fund your project or get enter a paid role to power the platform.
